column5: Hey guys. Just thought I'd pass on that Princess Auto (Mississauga) had the Mr. Heater Little Buddy on sale for $59.99 and the Big Buddy on for $129.99. They unfortunately don't have any of the mid size Buddy heaters. Those are great prices for these units and a good time to grab them if you need them (I did!!).  Also, they have telescoping shovels for $3.49 that make a great portable hut shovel.  Cheers!
What day did the sale start?  Was checking the current flyer online...didn't see them.  Thanks,

It doesn't show up in the flyer. It caught me totally by surprise as well. They are at the back of the store in two piles clearly marked. When I got to the cash, they had to over ride the price but they gave it to me for 59.99. Better go quick before they take the signs down.
Might just be the Mississauga store as well...I will check the one here in Kitchener.  Thanks for the heads up.
Barrie store does not have any.
BPS has the midsize for 99.99 couple weeks back.... Sweet heater!
Ya, I've got that one for me and I picked up the little buddy for my son (fishman2202). He was looking for one for his new one man hut. I need more btu's for my   . Haha!
